Description: 1978 American Fender Stratocaster in Fender Case Made in the USA 1978 American Fender Stratocaster in Fender Case Made in the USA Click images to enlarge Description 1978 American Fender Stratocaster in Fender Case Made in the USA (Please scroll down to see all the pictures; pictures can be supersized by clicking on them.)   Available for auction is a 1978 Fender Stratocaster Made in the USA. This is being sold in pre-owned condition with some signs of wear from use from the previous owner. This guitar has been tested is fully functional and plays and sounds great. Comes with Fender Hardshell case shown in photos. See Photos for Condition and feel free to ask any questions. Good luck and happy bidding. We pack carefully and ship promptly    (See Pictures For Better Details) Pictures are of the actual item being auctioned. We never use stock photographs. PLEASE NOTE: When a FedEx shipping option is available, the auction will show an ESTIMATED shipping cost for the item via FedEx. This is automatically provided from FedEx, through Ebay, and is beyond our control. When the auction ends you will automatically receive an Ebay-generated invoice with a final shipping amount. This amount may be higher than the original estimate. Again, this is done automatically and is beyond our control.   Please contact us with any questions.   CONDITION   (See Pictures For Better Details)   AUCTION CONTENT One (1)  1978 American Fender Stratocaster in Fender Case Made in the USA   TERMS AND CONDITIONS 1. We try to describe what we know to be wrong with such items, but at times (especially with electronic items) it is impossible to know all that may be wrong with the item. 2. CUSTOMER SERVICE 1. If you need assistance please contact us using the ebay "Ask Seller a Question" link. You may also call us Mon-Sat, 10:00am-4:00pm, Eastern Time-- 434-845-7296 3. PAYMENT 1. Our preferred method of payment is PayPal. 2. Payment is expected within 3 days from the end of the auction. If you can not pay within that time, please contact us for arrangements. If we are not contacted by the third day, an "unpaid item" case will be initiated. 3. Residents of Virginia will be charged sales tax of 5.3% as required by law. 4. SHIPPING 1. Please see the " Shipping and payments" tab that is in every listing for the shipping services available and cost. 2. If a shipping service is not shown to your location please contact us for an estimate. 3. When payment is made with PayPal, we will only ship to the PayPal address. This is due to the ebay buyer protection and PayPal seller protection policies. 4. FedEx and UPS cannot ship to Post Office Boxes. If you require shipping to a P O Box, choose USPS shipping and if USPS is not shown as an option, please contact us before bidding. 4.1 International 1. Duty, customs fees, tariffs, taxes, etc. - The item value used on the customs declaration form will be the amount you paid not including shipping cost.  We will not use a false or devalued amount on customs declaration forms. We will not indicate your purchase is a "gift." Duty, customs fees, tariffs, taxes, etc. are not included in the payment made to us; these are all the responsibility of the buyer to pay. A 30% fee and any associated return shipping expenses will be charged the buyer for an item that is returned/refused due to non-payment of duty, customs fees, tariffs, taxes, etc. These will be deducted from any refund due. 2. International shipments can take up to 25 business days to arrive at a destination mainly due to delays in customs. Please allow adequate time for your item to arrive before contacting us. 4.2 Domestic 1. When UPS ground service has been selected at ebay checkout we reserve the right to substitute FedEx as the carrier for your package. 2. Some of the small and light weight items will be shipped by USPS only. 3. The shipping price calculator for FedEx shipping provides an ESTIMATED cost before the auction reaches its final value.  The invoice you receive is automatically generated by Ebay, based on the shipping costs as computed by the shipper. Please be aware that the price quote you receive before bidding may be less than the shipping price on the invoice. 5. RETURNS 1. Items that are not as described may be returned within 30 days of receiving the item. Items must be returned as received, with all packaging and parts. 2.
